StatusCode.Name: Good
StatusCode.Description: The operation succeeded.

StatusCode.Name: Uncertain
StatusCode.Description: The operation was uncertain.

StatusCode.Name: Bad
StatusCode.Description: The operation failed.

StatusCode.Name: BadUnexpectedError
StatusCode.Description: An unexpected error occurred.

StatusCode.Name: BadInternalError
StatusCode.Description: An internal error occurred as a result of a programming or configuration error.

StatusCode.Name: BadOutOfMemory
StatusCode.Description: Not enough memory to complete the operation.

StatusCode.Name: BadResourceUnavailable
StatusCode.Description: An operating system resource is not available.

StatusCode.Name: BadCommunicationError
StatusCode.Description: A low level communication error occurred.

StatusCode.Name: BadEncodingError
StatusCode.Description: Encoding halted because of invalid data in the objects being serialized.

StatusCode.Name: BadDecodingError
StatusCode.Description: Decoding halted because of invalid data in the stream.

StatusCode.Name: BadEncodingLimitsExceeded
StatusCode.Description: The message encoding/decoding limits imposed by the stack have been exceeded.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestTooLarge
StatusCode.Description: The request message size exceeds limits set by the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadResponseTooLarge
StatusCode.Description: The response message size exceeds limits set by the client.

StatusCode.Name: BadUnknownResponse
StatusCode.Description: An unrecognized response was received from the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadTimeout
StatusCode.Description: The operation timed out.

StatusCode.Name: BadServiceUnsupported
StatusCode.Description: The server does not support the requested service.

StatusCode.Name: BadShutdown
StatusCode.Description: The operation was cancelled because the application is shutting down.

StatusCode.Name: BadServerNotConnected
StatusCode.Description: The operation could not complete because the client is not connected to the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadServerHalted
StatusCode.Description: The server has stopped and cannot process any requests.

StatusCode.Name: BadNothingToDo
StatusCode.Description: There was nothing to do because the client passed a list of operations with no elements.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManyOperations
StatusCode.Description: The request could not be processed because it specified too many operations.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManyMonitoredItems
StatusCode.Description: The request could not be processed because there are too many monitored items in the subscription.

StatusCode.Name: BadDataTypeIdUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The extension object cannot be (de)serialized because the data type id is not recognized.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The certificate provided as a parameter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecurityChecksFailed
StatusCode.Description: An error occurred verifying security.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificatePolicyCheckFailed
StatusCode.Description: The certificate does not meet the requirements of the security policy.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateTimeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The certificate has expired or is not yet valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateIssuerTimeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: An issuer certificate has expired or is not yet valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateHostNameInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The HostName used to connect to a server does not match a HostName in the certificate.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateUriInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The URI specified in the ApplicationDescription does not match the URI in the certificate.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateUseNotAllowed
StatusCode.Description: The certificate may not be used for the requested operation.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateIssuerUseNotAllowed
StatusCode.Description: The issuer certificate may not be used for the requested operation.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateUntrusted
StatusCode.Description: The certificate is not trusted.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateRevocationUnknown
StatusCode.Description: It was not possible to determine if the certificate has been revoked.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateIssuerRevocationUnknown
StatusCode.Description: It was not possible to determine if the issuer certificate has been revoked.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateRevoked
StatusCode.Description: The certificate has been revoked.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateIssuerRevoked
StatusCode.Description: The issuer certificate has been revoked.

StatusCode.Name: BadCertificateChainIncomplete
StatusCode.Description: The certificate chain is incomplete.

StatusCode.Name: BadUserAccessDenied
StatusCode.Description: User does not have permission to perform the requested operation.

StatusCode.Name: BadIdentityTokenInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The user identity token is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadIdentityTokenRejected
StatusCode.Description: The user identity token is valid but the server has rejected it.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecureChannelIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The specified secure channel is no longer valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadInvalidTimestamp
StatusCode.Description: The timestamp is outside the range allowed by the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadNonceInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The nonce does appear to be not a random value or it is not the correct length.

StatusCode.Name: BadSessionIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The session id is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadSessionClosed
StatusCode.Description: The session was closed by the client.

StatusCode.Name: BadSessionNotActivated
StatusCode.Description: The session cannot be used because ActivateSession has not been called.

StatusCode.Name: BadSubscriptionIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The subscription id is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestHeaderInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The header for the request is missing or invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadTimestampsToReturnInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The timestamps to return parameter is invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestCancelledByClient
StatusCode.Description: The request was cancelled by the client.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManyArguments
StatusCode.Description: Too many arguments were provided.

StatusCode.Name: BadLicenseExpired
StatusCode.Description: The server requires a license to operate in general or to perform a service or operation, but existing license is expired.

StatusCode.Name: BadLicenseLimitsExceeded
StatusCode.Description: The server has limits on number of allowed operations / objects, based on installed licenses, and these limits where exceeded.

StatusCode.Name: BadLicenseNotAvailable
StatusCode.Description: The server does not have a license which is required to operate in general or to perform a service or operation.

StatusCode.Name: GoodSubscriptionTransferred
StatusCode.Description: The subscription was transferred to another session.

StatusCode.Name: GoodCompletesAsynchronously
StatusCode.Description: The processing will complete asynchronously.

StatusCode.Name: GoodOverload
StatusCode.Description: Sampling has slowed down due to resource limitations.

StatusCode.Name: GoodClamped
StatusCode.Description: The value written was accepted but was clamped.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoCommunication
StatusCode.Description: Communication with the data source is defined, but not established, and there is no last known value available.

StatusCode.Name: BadWaitingForInitialData
StatusCode.Description: Waiting for the server to obtain values from the underlying data source.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The syntax of the node id is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeIdUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The node id refers to a node that does not exist in the server address space.

StatusCode.Name: BadAttributeIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The attribute is not supported for the specified Node.

StatusCode.Name: BadIndexRangeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The syntax of the index range parameter is invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadIndexRangeNoData
StatusCode.Description: No data exists within the range of indexes specified.

StatusCode.Name: BadDataEncodingInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The data encoding is invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadDataEncodingUnsupported
StatusCode.Description: The server does not support the requested data encoding for the node.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotReadable
StatusCode.Description: The access level does not allow reading or subscribing to the Node.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotWritable
StatusCode.Description: The access level does not allow writing to the Node.

StatusCode.Name: BadOutOfRange
StatusCode.Description: The value was out of range.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The requested operation is not supported.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotFound
StatusCode.Description: A requested item was not found or a search operation ended without success.

StatusCode.Name: BadObjectDeleted
StatusCode.Description: The object cannot be used because it has been deleted.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotImplemented
StatusCode.Description: Requested operation is not implemented.

StatusCode.Name: BadMonitoringModeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The monitoring mode is invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadMonitoredItemIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The monitoring item id does not refer to a valid monitored item.

StatusCode.Name: BadMonitoredItemFilterInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The monitored item filter parameter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadMonitoredItemFilterUnsupported
StatusCode.Description: The server does not support the requested monitored item filter.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterNotAllowed
StatusCode.Description: A monitoring filter cannot be used in combination with the attribute specified.

StatusCode.Name: BadStructureMissing
StatusCode.Description: A mandatory structured parameter was missing or null.

StatusCode.Name: BadEventFilterInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The event filter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadContentFilterInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The content filter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterOperatorInvalid
StatusCode.Description: An unrecognized operator was provided in a filter.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterOperatorUnsupported
StatusCode.Description: A valid operator was provided, but the server does not provide support for this filter operator.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterOperandCountMismatch
StatusCode.Description: The number of operands provided for the filter operator was less then expected for the operand provided.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterOperandInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The operand used in a content filter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterElementInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The referenced element is not a valid element in the content filter.

StatusCode.Name: BadFilterLiteralInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The referenced literal is not a valid value.

StatusCode.Name: BadContinuationPointInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The continuation point provide is longer valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoContinuationPoints
StatusCode.Description: The operation could not be processed because all continuation points have been allocated.

StatusCode.Name: BadReferenceTypeIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The reference type id does not refer to a valid reference type node.

StatusCode.Name: BadBrowseDirectionInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The browse direction is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeNotInView
StatusCode.Description: The node is not part of the view.

StatusCode.Name: BadNumericOverflow
StatusCode.Description: The number was not accepted because of a numeric overflow.

StatusCode.Name: BadServerUriInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The ServerUri is not a valid URI.

StatusCode.Name: BadServerNameMissing
StatusCode.Description: No ServerName was specified.

StatusCode.Name: BadDiscoveryUrlMissing
StatusCode.Description: No DiscoveryUrl was specified.

StatusCode.Name: BadSempahoreFileMissing
StatusCode.Description: The semaphore file specified by the client is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestTypeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The security token request type is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecurityModeRejected
StatusCode.Description: The security mode does not meet the requirements set by the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecurityPolicyRejected
StatusCode.Description: The security policy does not meet the requirements set by the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManySessions
StatusCode.Description: The server has reached its maximum number of sessions.

StatusCode.Name: BadUserSignatureInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The user token signature is missing or invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadApplicationSignatureInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The signature generated with the client certificate is missing or invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoValidCertificates
StatusCode.Description: The client did not provide at least one software certificate that is valid and meets the profile requirements for the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadIdentityChangeNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The server does not support changing the user identity assigned to the session.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestCancelledByRequest
StatusCode.Description: The request was cancelled by the client with the Cancel service.

StatusCode.Name: BadParentNodeIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The parent node id does not to refer to a valid node.

StatusCode.Name: BadReferenceNotAllowed
StatusCode.Description: The reference could not be created because it violates constraints imposed by the data model.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeIdRejected
StatusCode.Description: The requested node id was reject because it was either invalid or server does not allow node ids to be specified by the client.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeIdExists
StatusCode.Description: The requested node id is already used by another node.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeClassInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The node class is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadBrowseNameInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The browse name is invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadBrowseNameDuplicated
StatusCode.Description: The browse name is not unique among nodes that share the same relationship with the parent.

StatusCode.Name: BadNodeAttributesInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The node attributes are not valid for the node class.

StatusCode.Name: BadTypeDefinitionInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The type definition node id does not reference an appropriate type node.

StatusCode.Name: BadSourceNodeIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The source node id does not reference a valid node.

StatusCode.Name: BadTargetNodeIdInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The target node id does not reference a valid node.

StatusCode.Name: BadDuplicateReferenceNotAllowed
StatusCode.Description: The reference type between the nodes is already defined.

StatusCode.Name: BadInvalidSelfReference
StatusCode.Description: The server does not allow this type of self reference on this node.

StatusCode.Name: BadReferenceLocalOnly
StatusCode.Description: The reference type is not valid for a reference to a remote server.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoDeleteRights
StatusCode.Description: The server will not allow the node to be deleted.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainReferenceNotDeleted
StatusCode.Description: The server was not able to delete all target references.

StatusCode.Name: BadServerIndexInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The server index is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadViewIdUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The view id does not refer to a valid view node.

StatusCode.Name: BadViewTimestampInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The view timestamp is not available or not supported.

StatusCode.Name: BadViewParameterMismatch
StatusCode.Description: The view parameters are not consistent with each other.

StatusCode.Name: BadViewVersionInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The view version is not available or not supported.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainNotAllNodesAvailable
StatusCode.Description: The list of references may not be complete because the underlying system is not available.

StatusCode.Name: GoodResultsMayBeIncomplete
StatusCode.Description: The server should have followed a reference to a node in a remote server but did not. The result set may be incomplete.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotTypeDefinition
StatusCode.Description: The provided Nodeid was not a type definition nodeid.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainReferenceOutOfServer
StatusCode.Description: One of the references to follow in the relative path references to a node in the address space in another server.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManyMatches
StatusCode.Description: The requested operation has too many matches to return.

StatusCode.Name: BadQueryTooComplex
StatusCode.Description: The requested operation requires too many resources in the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoMatch
StatusCode.Description: The requested operation has no match to return.

StatusCode.Name: BadMaxAgeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The max age parameter is invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecurityModeInsufficient
StatusCode.Description: The operation is not permitted over the current secure channel.

StatusCode.Name: BadHistoryOperationInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The history details parameter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadHistoryOperationUnsupported
StatusCode.Description: The server does not support the requested operation.

StatusCode.Name: BadInvalidTimestampArgument
StatusCode.Description: The defined timestamp to return was invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadWriteNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The server does not support writing the combination of value, status and timestamps provided.

StatusCode.Name: BadTypeMismatch
StatusCode.Description: The value supplied for the attribute is not of the same type as the attribute's value.

StatusCode.Name: BadMethodInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The method id does not refer to a method for the specified object.

StatusCode.Name: BadArgumentsMissing
StatusCode.Description: The client did not specify all of the input arguments for the method.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotExecutable
StatusCode.Description: The executable attribute does not allow the execution of the method.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManySubscriptions
StatusCode.Description: The server has reached its maximum number of subscriptions.

StatusCode.Name: BadTooManyPublishRequests
StatusCode.Description: The server has reached the maximum number of queued publish requests.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoSubscription
StatusCode.Description: There is no subscription available for this session.

StatusCode.Name: BadSequenceNumberUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The sequence number is unknown to the server.

StatusCode.Name: GoodRetransmissionQueueNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The Server does not support retransmission queue and acknowledgement of sequence numbers is not available.

StatusCode.Name: BadMessageNotAvailable
StatusCode.Description: The requested notification message is no longer available.

StatusCode.Name: BadInsufficientClientProfile
StatusCode.Description: The client of the current session does not support one or more Profiles that are necessary for the subscription.

StatusCode.Name: BadStateNotActive
StatusCode.Description: The sub-state machine is not currently active.

StatusCode.Name: BadAlreadyExists
StatusCode.Description: An equivalent rule already exists.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpServerTooBusy
StatusCode.Description: The server cannot process the request because it is too busy.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpMessageTypeInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The type of the message specified in the header invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpSecureChannelUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The SecureChannelId and/or TokenId are not currently in use.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpMessageTooLarge
StatusCode.Description: The size of the message chunk specified in the header is too large.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpNotEnoughResources
StatusCode.Description: There are not enough resources to process the request.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpInternalError
StatusCode.Description: An internal error occurred.

StatusCode.Name: BadTcpEndpointUrlInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The server does not recognize the QueryString specified.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestInterrupted
StatusCode.Description: The request could not be sent because of a network interruption.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestTimeout
StatusCode.Description: Timeout occurred while processing the request.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecureChannelClosed
StatusCode.Description: The secure channel has been closed.

StatusCode.Name: BadSecureChannelTokenUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The token has expired or is not recognized.

StatusCode.Name: BadSequenceNumberInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The sequence number is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: BadProtocolVersionUnsupported
StatusCode.Description: The applications do not have compatible protocol versions.

StatusCode.Name: BadConfigurationError
StatusCode.Description: There is a problem with the configuration that affects the usefulness of the value.

StatusCode.Name: BadNotConnected
StatusCode.Description: The variable should receive its value from another variable, but has never been configured to do so.

StatusCode.Name: BadDeviceFailure
StatusCode.Description: There has been a failure in the device/data source that generates the value that has affected the value.

StatusCode.Name: BadSensorFailure
StatusCode.Description: There has been a failure in the sensor from which the value is derived by the device/data source.

StatusCode.Name: BadOutOfService
StatusCode.Description: The source of the data is not operational.

StatusCode.Name: BadDeadbandFilterInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The deadband filter is not valid.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainNoCommunicationLastUsableValue
StatusCode.Description: Communication to the data source has failed. The variable value is the last value that had a good quality.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainLastUsableValue
StatusCode.Description: Whatever was updating this value has stopped doing so.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainSubstituteValue
StatusCode.Description: The value is an operational value that was manually overwritten.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainInitialValue
StatusCode.Description: The value is an initial value for a variable that normally receives its value from another variable.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainSensorNotAccurate
StatusCode.Description: The value is at one of the sensor limits.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainEngineeringUnitsExceeded
StatusCode.Description: The value is outside of the range of values defined for this parameter.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainSubNormal
StatusCode.Description: The value is derived from multiple sources and has less than the required number of Good sources.

StatusCode.Name: GoodLocalOverride
StatusCode.Description: The value has been overridden.

StatusCode.Name: BadRefreshInProgress
StatusCode.Description: This Condition refresh failed, a Condition refresh operation is already in progress.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionAlreadyDisabled
StatusCode.Description: This condition has already been disabled.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionAlreadyEnabled
StatusCode.Description: This condition has already been enabled.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionDisabled
StatusCode.Description: Property not available, this condition is disabled.

StatusCode.Name: BadEventIdUnknown
StatusCode.Description: The specified event id is not recognized.

StatusCode.Name: BadEventNotAcknowledgeable
StatusCode.Description: The event cannot be acknowledged.

StatusCode.Name: BadDialogNotActive
StatusCode.Description: The dialog condition is not active.

StatusCode.Name: BadDialogResponseInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The response is not valid for the dialog.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionBranchAlreadyAcked
StatusCode.Description: The condition branch has already been acknowledged.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionBranchAlreadyConfirmed
StatusCode.Description: The condition branch has already been confirmed.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionAlreadyShelved
StatusCode.Description: The condition has already been shelved.

StatusCode.Name: BadConditionNotShelved
StatusCode.Description: The condition is not currently shelved.

StatusCode.Name: BadShelvingTimeOutOfRange
StatusCode.Description: The shelving time not within an acceptable range.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoData
StatusCode.Description: No data exists for the requested time range or event filter.

StatusCode.Name: BadBoundNotFound
StatusCode.Description: No data found to provide upper or lower bound value.

StatusCode.Name: BadBoundNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The server cannot retrieve a bound for the variable.

StatusCode.Name: BadDataLost
StatusCode.Description: Data is missing due to collection started/stopped/lost.

StatusCode.Name: BadDataUnavailable
StatusCode.Description: Expected data is unavailable for the requested time range due to an un-mounted volume, an off-line archive or tape, or similar reason for temporary unavailability.

StatusCode.Name: BadEntryExists
StatusCode.Description: The data or event was not successfully inserted because a matching entry exists.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoEntryExists
StatusCode.Description: The data or event was not successfully updated because no matching entry exists.

StatusCode.Name: BadTimestampNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The client requested history using a timestamp format the server does not support (i.e requested ServerTimestamp when server only supports SourceTimestamp).

StatusCode.Name: GoodEntryInserted
StatusCode.Description: The data or event was successfully inserted into the historical database.

StatusCode.Name: GoodEntryReplaced
StatusCode.Description: The data or event field was successfully replaced in the historical database.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainDataSubNormal
StatusCode.Description: The value is derived from multiple values and has less than the required number of Good values.

StatusCode.Name: GoodNoData
StatusCode.Description: No data exists for the requested time range or event filter.

StatusCode.Name: GoodMoreData
StatusCode.Description: The data or event field was successfully replaced in the historical database.

StatusCode.Name: BadAggregateListMismatch
StatusCode.Description: The requested number of Aggregates does not match the requested number of NodeIds.

StatusCode.Name: BadAggregateNotSupported
StatusCode.Description: The requested Aggregate is not support by the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadAggregateInvalidInputs
StatusCode.Description: The aggregate value could not be derived due to invalid data inputs.

StatusCode.Name: BadAggregateConfigurationRejected
StatusCode.Description: The aggregate configuration is not valid for specified node.

StatusCode.Name: GoodDataIgnored
StatusCode.Description: The request specifies fields which are not valid for the EventType or cannot be saved by the historian.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestNotAllowed
StatusCode.Description: The request was rejected by the server because it did not meet the criteria set by the server.

StatusCode.Name: BadRequestNotComplete
StatusCode.Description: The request has not been processed by the server yet.

StatusCode.Name: BadTicketRequired
StatusCode.Description: The device identity needs a ticket before it can be accepted.

StatusCode.Name: BadTicketInvalid
StatusCode.Description: The device identity needs a ticket before it can be accepted.

StatusCode.Name: GoodEdited
StatusCode.Description: The value does not come from the real source and has been edited by the server.

StatusCode.Name: GoodPostActionFailed
StatusCode.Description: There was an error in execution of these post-actions.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainDominantValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: The related EngineeringUnit has been changed but the Variable Value is still provided based on the previous unit.

StatusCode.Name: GoodDependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: A dependent value has been changed but the change has not been applied to the device.

StatusCode.Name: BadDominantValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: The related EngineeringUnit has been changed but this change has not been applied to the device. The Variable Value is still dependent on the previous unit but its status is currently Bad.

StatusCode.Name: UncertainDependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: A dependent value has been changed but the change has not been applied to the device. The quality of the dominant variable is uncertain.

StatusCode.Name: BadDependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: A dependent value has been changed but the change has not been applied to the device. The quality of the dominant variable is Bad.

StatusCode.Name: GoodEdited_DependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dominant Variable value when a dependent Variable has changed but the change has not been applied.

StatusCode.Name: GoodEdited_DominantValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant Variable has changed but the change has not been applied.

StatusCode.Name: GoodEdited_DominantValueChanged_DependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant or dependent Variable has changed but change has not been applied.

StatusCode.Name: BadEdited_OutOfRange
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a Variable value when Variable has changed but the value is not legal.

StatusCode.Name: BadInitialValue_OutOfRange
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a Variable value when a source Variable has changed but the value is not legal.

StatusCode.Name: BadOutOfRange_DominantValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant Variable has changed and the value is not legal.

StatusCode.Name: BadEdited_OutOfRange_DominantValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant Variable has changed, the value is not legal and the change has not been applied.

StatusCode.Name: BadOutOfRange_DominantValueChanged_DependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant or dependent Variable has changed and the value is not legal.

StatusCode.Name: BadEdited_OutOfRange_DominantValueChanged_DependentValueChanged
StatusCode.Description: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant or dependent Variable has changed, the value is not legal and the change has not been applied.

StatusCode.Name: GoodCommunicationEvent
StatusCode.Description: The communication layer has raised an event.

StatusCode.Name: GoodShutdownEvent
StatusCode.Description: The system is shutting down.

StatusCode.Name: GoodCallAgain
StatusCode.Description: The operation is not finished and needs to be called again.

StatusCode.Name: GoodNonCriticalTimeout
StatusCode.Description: A non-critical timeout occurred.

StatusCode.Name: BadInvalidArgument
StatusCode.Description: One or more arguments are invalid.

StatusCode.Name: BadConnectionRejected
StatusCode.Description: Could not establish a network connection to remote server.

StatusCode.Name: BadDisconnect
StatusCode.Description: The server has disconnected from the client.

StatusCode.Name: BadConnectionClosed
StatusCode.Description: The network connection has been closed.

StatusCode.Name: BadInvalidState
StatusCode.Description: The operation cannot be completed because the object is closed, uninitialized or in some other invalid state.

StatusCode.Name: BadEndOfStream
StatusCode.Description: Cannot move beyond end of the stream.

StatusCode.Name: BadNoDataAvailable
StatusCode.Description: No data is currently available for reading from a non-blocking stream.

StatusCode.Name: BadWaitingForResponse
StatusCode.Description: The asynchronous operation is waiting for a response.

StatusCode.Name: BadOperationAbandoned
StatusCode.Description: The asynchronous operation was abandoned by the caller.

StatusCode.Name: BadExpectedStreamToBlock
StatusCode.Description: The stream did not return all data requested (possibly because it is a non-blocking stream).

StatusCode.Name: BadWouldBlock
StatusCode.Description: Non blocking behaviour is required and the operation would block.

StatusCode.Name: BadSyntaxError
StatusCode.Description: A value had an invalid syntax.

StatusCode.Name: BadMaxConnectionsReached
StatusCode.Description: The operation could not be finished because all available connections are in use.
